name: HTMLLyricsCreator
short_description:
Do you have many mp3 albums ? Do you usually record them on CD's ? Would you like to have them "immortally" recorded with an accompaining lyrics HTML file ? Then this program is for you.
HTMLLyricsCreator lets you edit an album's lyrics with ease
